page_content: The page discusses tax-deductible and non-deductible expenses in the context of agricultural and forestry activities.
The page announces a scheduled test of sirens for public alert in the Canton of Bern.
The page outlines the requirements and responsibilities for companies offering vocational training in the Canton of Bern.
The page provides information on how to declare inheritances for tax purposes in the Canton of Bern.
The page provides a summary of various decisions and announcements made by the government of the Canton of Bern, covering topics like energy regulations, healthcare, and education.
